dt: {bc}the act or custom of a Hindu widow burning herself to death or being burned to death on the funeral pyre of her husband
{bc}a woman burned to death in this way

shortdef: the act or custom of a Hindu widow burning herself to death or being burned to death on the funeral pyre of her husband; also : a woman burned to death in this way

dt: {bc}the act or custom of a Hindu widow burning herself to death or being burned to death on the funeral pyre of her husband
{bc}a woman burned to death in this way

et: Hindi {it}satī{/it} wife who performs suttee, from Sanskrit, devoted woman, from feminine of {it}sat{/it} true, good; akin to Old English {it}sōth{/it} true {ma}{mat|sooth|}{/ma}
shortdef: the act or custom of a Hindu widow burning herself to death or being burned to death on the funeral pyre of her husband; also : a woman burned to death in this way
